div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1233 Asia Minor, western, 1967 Burial: 4th cent. B.C. (M) Contents: 35 AR Cyzicus: 1 st. (as BMC 124 ff.) Ephesus: 1 tetradr. (as BMC 30 ff.) Persia: 33 sigloi (king carrying spear, king with dagger) Disposition: Ankara (inv. no. 1738) Information from Saadet Taner
